name: Brake Bleeder Hose One Way Check Valve 2-Piece Kit,Universal Brake Bleeding Kit for Hydraulic Brakes System,Leak-Proof Brakes Bleeder Tool Set with Clamps & Bleeders Valve Cap
short_description: Stop Backflow: This brake bleeder check valve allows brake fluid to flow in one direction only (the arrow clearly indicates the flow direction to avoid reverse installation), solving the problem of "air suction and brake fluid backflow" during traditional bleeding procedures

Leak-proof: Each brake bleeder hose connection features a specialized clamp for a tight, gap-free seal that avoids fluid leakage. This effectively avoids brake fluid seepage that could damage the braking system, allowing for cleaner, safer bleeding operations

2 Complete Kits: Package includes 2 one-way check valves, 2 outlet hoses, 2 inlet hoses, 4 brake bleed screw caps, 1 x storage box, 2 large clamps, and 4 small clamps. Compatible with most cars/motorcycles on the market, suitable for brake fluid replacement and brake system bleeding

Simple Operation: This brake bleeder tool features clear, straightforward steps that can be completed by a single person. Its check valve enables “one-way air bleeding,” without the need to repeatedly open and close screws or squeeze hoses, significantly reducing labor and time costs

Premium Materials: The brake bleeding hose is crafted from resilient material, durable and resistant to hardening or cracking from prolonged exposure to fluids. The one-way brake bleeder valve utilizes quality metal construction, offering strong resistance to aging and rust
product_description: BRAKE BLEEDER HOSE WITH ONE WAY CHECK VALVE: PROFESSIONAL RESULTS MADE EASY Product Attributes Colors: Silver Sizes: One-Way Check Valve: L 2.14 inches x Outlet OD 0.24 inches x Inlet OD 0.22 inches Outlet Hose: L 13.18 inches x OD 0.3 inches Inlet Hose: L 5.7 inches x OD 0.22 inches Brake Bleeder Screw Caps: Height 0.45 inches x OD 0.45 inches x ID 0.22 inches Weight: 5.24 oz Material: Iron + Plastic + Rubber Packaging: 2 x One-Way Check Valve 2 x Outlet Hose 2 x Inlet Hose 4 x Brake Bleeder Screw Caps 2 x Large Clamps 4 x Small Clamps 1 x Storage Box Operating Procedure ① Clean the brake bleed screw and take off the cap ② Connect one end of the inlet hose to the check valve, then fit the other end over the bleed screw and secure it with a clamp ③ Connect one end of the outlet hose to the check valve outlet and place the other end in a collection container ④ Open the bleed screw and depress the brake pedal. Old fluid/air will drain unidirectionally through the hose ⑤ Repeat until no bubbles remain in the drained brake fluid Product Feature & Functions One-Way Check Valve: Keeps air from flowing back, allowing complete air purging Leak-proof Clamps: Keep all connection points airtight and leak-free Transparent Hose: Visually monitor fluid and bubble conditions Complete Two-Piece Kit: Everything needed for professional-grade bleeding

short_description: Complete Brake Bleeding Kit: Includes a 100ml syringe, 19.7in hose, adapter, pressure clamp, connector, valve, 5.91in and 14.17in hoses, 3 clamps, 2 pressure relief caps (M6/M8/M10), and 5 adjustable port adapters — everything you need for a full brake and clutch fluid replacement

One-Way Check Valve: Precision-engineered to let fluid flow in only one direction, blocking air, dust, and debris from entering the brake or clutch system during bleeding. Built-in metal valve clamp provides a tight, leak-free seal during venting and removal

Bubble-Free Performance & Versatile Extraction: Includes a reverse brake fluid bleed kit for wider compatibility. Quickly clears air bubbles and blockages in hydraulic brake lines, ensuring a firmer brake feel and delivering a safer, smoother riding experience

Additional Airtightness & Convenience: The blue adapter features a 0.8 in–deep, 0.18 in–diameter connector that fits tightly onto the bleed port without clamps—just press to lock it in place. When using the adapter, connect both ends of the check valve to the thick hose

One Man Brake Bleeding: Easy to set up—connect this kit to the hose, then attach it to the bleed nozzle to begin. Designed for quick, one-person bleeding of your hydraulic system with no extra help needed

Wide Compatibility: Our brake bleeder kit fits a wide range of vehicle makes and models.
